vocabulary_id.description:
User Guidance: A unique identifier for each Vocabulary, such
as ICD9CM, SNOMED, Visit.

vocabulary_name.description:
User Guidance: The name describing the vocabulary, for
example, International Classification of
Diseases, Ninth Revision, Clinical
Modification, Volume 1 and 2 (NCHS) etc.

vocabulary_reference.description:
User Guidance: External reference to documentation or
available download of the about the
vocabulary.

vocabulary_version.description:
User Guidance: Version of the Vocabulary as indicated in
the source.

vocabulary_concept_id.description: User Guidance: A Concept that represents the Vocabulary the VOCABULARY record belongs to.
